item.title: Uneven block paving, 23rd June
item.description:
A number of blocks are raised or missing causing a trip hazard

item.title: NOT A DUPLICATE - No black bin installed, 23rd June
item.description:
The issue on Streetcare has already been closed as I have been told to report it on here, so please do not mark this as a duplicate. There has been no black bin installed since the bus stop opened and litter is continuosly left on the left or bags hung on the fencing.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Shackleton Way, Gallions Reach, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Flypost, 23rd June
item.description:

Please remove flypostering from Keep Left sign on centre island Reference - 4807040

item.title: Blocked drain, 23rd June
item.description:
Re: report 7673762. I reported these blocked drains during a period of rain. You closed the previous report saying that drain had been checked and the problem was down to heavy rain. I have been back and checked the drains and there is clearly debris in the drains, albeit this is difficult to see in the photo. As such, I am resubmitting this fix my street request for the two blocked drains to be cleared.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Church Lane, Chislehurst, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Repaint bay parking lines, 23rd June
item.description:
Hi, between 41 and 57 colindale avenue DA8 the bay parking lines on the footway are fading, resulting in parking enforcement giving tickets even tho we are parking within the bay lines. Could they be repainted please. Thankyou

item.title: Graffiti on wall, 23rd June
item.description:
Graffiti on the towpath wall next to a gate that leads to a car park. The graffiti has been there since May. Thank you!

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Riverside Close, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Perimeter hedge requires cutting back of Grassmead recreation ground, 23rd June
item.description:
Annual request to cut back hedge which boarders my property and recreation ground. Rear of 44 Finucane Drive*. Hedge needs to cut back to the chainlink fence and height of it. 6ft. Annual request. Sidearm usually used. My small garden is easily in the shadows when the trees on the rec are in full leaf, keeping the height of the hedge down helps. Thank you. *When standing on the rec, facing the houses in Finucane Drive, 44 is to the left of the single and adjacent double garage, I hope this helps.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Finucane Drive, Ramsden, London
Report on FixMyStreet
